Or you will be hurt again.

Forgetting loses the lesson.

html: Nothing is more dangerous than not accepting love relationships that are broken off, work that is promised but there is no starting date, decisions that are always put off waiting for the "ideal moment. But before a new chapter is begun, the old one has to be finished
text:
Nothing is more dangerous than not accepting love relationships that are  broken off, 
work that is promised but there is no starting date,  
decisions that are always put off waiting for the "ideal moment. 
But before  a new chapter is begun, the old one has to be finished

html: It’s always easy to blame others. You can spend your entire life blaming the world, but successes or failures are entirely your own responsibility. You can say that life is not fair, but it’s a complete waste of energy
text:
It’s always easy to blame others. 
You can spend your entire life blaming  the world, but successes or failures are entirely your own  responsibility.
You can say that life is not fair, but it’s a complete waste of  energy
